meta.title: DOT & Roadway Repair | Terratech
meta.description: Terratech specializes in sinkhole and void filling solutions using advanced 3D ground imaging and eco-friendly poly-foam technology for safe and efficient remediation without excavation.

text.subtitle: Stabilizing undermined pavement without excavation or extended lane closures.

section.description: Along with on site assessment and detailed visual observation of the area, Terratech's 3D Scanning techniques and analysis can show advanced warning signs for informed remediation.

The days of more patch than road is over. Deal with the root cause-under the pavement-and strengthen the soil with polymer injections. With stabilized soil, say goodbye to cracked, settled, bumpy asphalt, without disruption or long-term upkeep.

points.title: Early Detection
points.description: Subsurface voids, soil loss, and base instability are identified before surface failures worsen. Early insight allows repairs to be planned proactively rather than reacting after pavement distress becomes visible.

points.title: Precision & Safety
points.description: Targeted assessment and controlled injection reduce uncertainty during repair. Crews address only compromised areas, limiting exposure to adjacent utilities, structures, and active traffic.

points.title: Minimal Disruption
points.description: Non-invasive stabilization eliminates the need for excavation or full-depth pavement removal. Roads can often remain open or partially open during work, reducing impacts to traffic flow and public access.

points.title: Customized Solutions
points.description: Each roadway presents different soil conditions, loading demands, and failure mechanisms. Repair strategies are tailored to site-specific data, ensuring the appropriate level of stabilization without overbuilding the solution.

section.description: TerraTech stabilizes subsurface voids and weak soils beneath roadways without excavation, restoring support while keeping the surface intact.
